data.comment: The interface where external transient config values can be set for the conveyor_pose plugin.
data.field: True if a product detection should be run and remove detected cycles. This should only be activated if there is a product to be expected, otherwise the performance decreases.

message.name: enable_product_removal
message.comment: Enables the detection of cycles to remove product out of the point clouds.

message.name: disable_product_removal
message.comment: Disables the detection of cycles to remove product out of the point clouds.
